programme.title: Full Moon with Timmy Trumpet
programme.desc: Every month, when the moon is at its brightest, Timmy Trumpet takes over One World Radio with a special one-hour show featuring the best music of the past moon cycle.

programme.title: Best of One World Radio with AdamK
programme.desc: So many things happen on One World Radio in just one week! That's why every Friday, One World Radio's AdamK serves you a one-hour show with the ultimate highlights of the week.

programme.title: Daybreak Sessions with Justin
programme.desc: Join Justin every weekday morning for "Daybreak Sessions," where he sets the perfect easy dance music vibe to kickstart your day. Tune in to One World Radio and let Justin accompany you through your morning routine with smooth tunes and positive vibes.
